name: HTML
description: HTML is a markup language used by the browser to manipulate text, images, and other content, in order to display it in the required format.

name: CSS
description: Cascading Style Sheets, or CSS, is a fundamental technology in web development that allows designers to control the presentation and layout of HTML documents. CSS is a styling language used to describe the look and formatting of a document written in HTML or XML. It enables the separation of content from design, making it easier to maintain and update websites. CSS operates on a cascade principle, where multiple style sheets can influence the presentation of a document. Styles are applied in a specific order, with later styles potentially overriding earlier ones. This flexibility allows for global styling rules and local overrides.

name: React.js

name: Tailwind CSS
description: Tailwind CSS is best used to speed up the development process by writing less code. It comes with a design system that helps maintain consistency across various design requirements like padding, spacing, and so forth; with this, you do not have to worry about creating your design systems.

name: Golang
description: Go, or Golang, is an open-source programming language developed by Google. Its simplicity, efficiency, and strong support for concurrent programming make it an ideal choice for building an Image Processing API.
